verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Today bring to me all
devout and faithful souls
and immense them in
the ocean of my mercy.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
These souls brought me
consolation on the way
of the cross.
They were that drop
of consolation in the midst
of an ocean of bitterness.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Most merciful Jesus,
from the treasury of
your mercy,
you impart your graces
in great abundance
to each and all.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Receive us into
the abode of your most
compassionate heart,
and never let us escape
from it.
We beg this grace of you,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
by that most wondrous love
for the heavenly Father,
with which your heart
burns so fiercely.
Eternal Father,
turn your merciful gaze

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
upon faithful souls,
as upon the inheritance
of your Son.
For the sake of
his sorrowful passion,
grant them your blessing,

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
and surround them
with your constant protection.
Thus may they never
fall in love,
or lose treasure
of the holy faith,

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
but rather,
with all the hosts
of Angels and Saints,
may they glorify your
boundless mercy,
for endless ages.
Amen.
